text: Illeana Douglas (born July 25, 1965) is an American actress. She has appeared in many movies and television programs. She was in the 1991 remake movie Cape Fear. She also acted in the television sitcom Ugly Betty. She also hosts many programs for Turner Classic Movies. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from Massachusetts Category:Movie producers from Massachusetts Category:Screenwriters from Massachusetts Category:American television presenters Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:People from Quincy, Massachusetts
title: Illeana Douglas
